# The requirements file is a way to get pip to install specific packages to 
# make up an environment.
jinja2
num2words

blinker
cachelib
flask
# Remove the version constraint once secure-cookie is released
# https://github.com/pallets/secure-cookie/issues/1
werkzeug <1.0.0
git+https://github.com/pallets/secure-cookie
flask-wtf
email_validator
Flask-Babel
Flask-Login
pytz
speaklater

.
